summary: Late 1800s Foshan, Guangdong: Wong Fei Hung/Jet Li trains men in martial arts to help defend against foreign powers already holding Hong Kong and Macau. He looks after cute 13th Aunt, who's just returned from England. Lots of fight scenes.
cast: Jet Li|Biao Yuen|Rosamund Kwan|Jacky Cheung|Kent Cheng|Kam-Fai Yuen|Shi-Kwan Yen|Shun Lau|Wu Ma|Jianguo Qiu|Cheung-Yan Yuen|Chi Yeung Wong|Shun-Yee Yuen|Xin Xin Xiong|Jonathan Isgar|Mark King|Steve Tartalia|Colin George|Gam-San Leung|Hsin Shen|Biu Lung|Pau-Chung Tong|Chi-Hung Ling|Gin Fei|Foo-Wai Lam|Chien-Po Tsen|Kwai-Bo Chun|Kim-Ban Wong|Anthony Carpio|Si Man Hui|Bruce Fontaine|Yuan-Ta Tsao|Tony Yuen|Jonna Peijffers|Mike Leeder
